Foure letters of comforts, for the deaths of the Earle of Hadingtoun, and of the Lord Boyd, with two epitaphs Boyd, Zacharie, 1585?-1653.
16 p.
Printed by George Anderson, Glasgow : 1640.
First epitaph signed: M. Zacharie Boyd. Reproduction of the original in the University of Edinburgh. Library.
